Verses: 1 thaaveedhaik Kondrupotumpatikku, Savul Than Kumaaranaakiya Yonaththaanotum Than Oozhiyakkaarar Ellaarotum Pesinaan.

2 savulin Kumaaranaakiya Yonaththaano, Thaaveedhinmel Mikavum Piriyamaayirundhaan; Adhanaal Yonaththaan Thaaveedhukku Adhai Ariviththu: En Thakappanaakiya Savul Ummaik Kondru Pota Vakaidhetukiraar; Ippodhum Naalaikkaalame Neer Echcharikkaiyaayirundhu, Maraivaana Itaththil Oliththukkontirum.
3 naan Purappattuvandhu, Neer Veliyilirukkum Itaththil En Thakappan Pakkaththile Nindru, Umakkaaka En Thakappanote Pesi, Natakkum Kaariyaththaik Kantu, Umakku Arivippen Endraan.

4 appatiye Yonaththaan Than Thakappanaakiya Savulote Thaaveedhukkaaka Nalamaaip Pesi, Raajaa Thammutaiya Atiyaanaakiya Thaaveedhukku Virodhamaaip Paavanjeyyaadhiruppaaraaka; Avan Umakku Virodhamaakap Paavanjeyyavillai; Avan Seykaikal Umakku Meththa Upayokamaayirukkiradhe.

5 avan Than Piraananaith Than Kaiyile Vaiththukkontu, Andhap Pelisdhanaik Kondradhinaale, Karththar Isravelukkellaam Periya Iratchippaik Kattalaiyittadhai Neer Kantu, Sandhoshappatteere; Ippodhum Mukaandharamillaamal Thaaveedhaik Kollukiradhinaal, Kutramillaadha Iraththaththirku Virodhamaaka Neer Paavanjeyvaanen Endraan.
6 savul Yonaththaanutaiya Sollaik Kettu: Avan Kolaiseyyappatuvadhillai Endru Karththarutaiya Jeevanaikkontu Aanaiyittaan.

7 pinpu Yonaththaan Thaaveedhai Azhaiththu, Andha Vaarththaikalaiyellaam Avanukku Ariviththu, Avanaich Chavulantaiyile Koottikkontupoi Vittaan; Appatiye Avan Mun Polave Avanutaiya Samukaththil Irundhaan.
8 marupatiyum Oru Yuththam Untaayitru; Appozhudhu Thaaveedhu Purappattup Poi, Pelisdharote Yuththampanni, Avarkalukkul Makaa Sangaarampanninadhinaal Avarkal Avanukku Munpaaka Murindhotipponaarkal.
9 karththaraal Vitappatta Pollaadha Aavi Savulinmel Vandhadhu; Avan Than Veettil Utkaarndhu, Than Eettiyaik Kaiyile Pitiththukkontirundhaan; Thaaveedhu Than Kaiyinaale Suramantalam Vaasiththaan.

10 appozhudhu Savul: Thaaveedhai Eettiyinaale Suvarote Serththu Uruvakkuththippotap Paarththaan; Aanaalum Ivan Savulukku Vilakinadhinaale, Avan Erindha Eetti Suvarile Pattadhu; Thaaveedho Andru Iraaththiri Otippoi, Thannaith Thappuviththukkontaan.

11 thaaveedhaik Kaavalpanni, Marunaal Kaalame Avanaik Kondru Potumpatikku, Savul Avan Veettirkuch Chevakarai Anuppinaan; Idhaith Thaaveedhukku Avan Manaiviyaakiya Meekaal Ariviththu: Neer Indru Iraaththiriyil Ummutaiya Piraananaith Thappuviththuk Kollaavittaal, Naalaikku Neer Kondrupotappatuveer Endru Solli,
12 meekaal Thaaveedhai Jannalvazhiyaai Irakkivittaal; Avan Thappi Otipponaan.
13 meekaalo Oru Suroopaththai Etuththu, Kattilinmel Vaiththu, Adhin Thalaimaattile Oru Vellaattuththolaippottu, Thuppattiyinaal Mootivaiththaal.
14 thaaveedhaik Kontuvarach Chavul Sevakarai Anuppinapodhu, Avar Viyaadhiyaayirukkiraar Endraal.
15 appozhudhu Thaaveedhaip Paarkkiradharkuch Chavul Sevakarai Anuppi, Avanaik Kondrupotumpatikku, Kattilote Avanai Ennitaththirku Etuththukkontuvaarungal Endraan.
16 sevakar Vandhapodhu, Idho, Suroopam Kattilinmelum, Vellaattuththol Adhin Thalaimaattilum Kitakkak Kantaarkal.

17 appozhudhu Savul: Nee Ippati Ennai Eyththu, En Pakaignanaith Thappavittu Anuppinadhu Enna Endru Meekaalitaththil Kettaan. Meekaal Savulai Nokki: Ennaip Pokavitu, Naan Unnai En Kollaventum Endru Avar Ennitaththil Sonnaar Endraal.
18 thaaveedhu Thappi, Raamaavilirundha Saamuvelitaththirkup Poi, Savul Thanakkuch Cheydhadhu Ellaavatraiyum Avanukku Ariviththaan; Pinpu Avanum Saamuvelum Poi, Naayodhile Thangiyirundhaarkal.
19 thaaveedhu Raamaavukkatuththa Naayodhile Irukkiraan Endru Savulukku Arivikkappattadhu.

20 appozhudhu Savul: Thaaveedhaik Kontuvarach Chevakarai Anuppinaan; Avarkal Theerkkadharisanam Sollukira Theerkkadharisikalin Koottaththaiyum, Saamuvel Avarkalin Thalaivanaaka Nirkiradhaiyum Kantaarkal; Appozhudhu Savulinutaiya Sevakarinmel Thevanutaiya Aavi Iranginadhinaal Avarkalum Theerkkadharisanam Sonnaarkal.
21 idhu Savulukku Arivikkappattapodhu, Avan Vere Sevakarai Anuppinaan; Avarkalum Theerkkadharisanam Sonnaarkal; Moondraandharamum Savul Sevakarai Anuppinaan; Avarkalum Theerkkadharisanam Sonnaarkal.

22 appozhudhu Avanum Raamaavukkup Poi, Sekkuvilirukkira Periya Kinatrantaiyile Vandhu, Saamuvelum Thaaveedhum Enge Endru Kettaan; Adho Raamaavukkatuththa Naayodhile Irukkiraarkal Endru Sollappattadhu.
23 appozhudhu Raamaavukkatuththa Naayodhirkup Ponaan; Avan Melum Thevanutaiya Aavi Iranginadhinaal Avan Raamaavukkatuththa Naayodhile Serumattum, Theerkkadharisanam Sollikkonte Natandhuvandhu,

24 thaanum Than Vasdhirangalaik Kazhatrippottu, Saamuvelukku Munpaakath Theerkkadharisanam Solli, Andru Pakal Muzhuvadhum Iraamuzhuvadhum Vasdhiram Illaamal Vizhundhukitandhaan; Aakaiyinaale Savulum Theerkkadharisikalil Oruvano Enpaarkal.
